languageKey.label: General Attributes
Global Attributes
HTML5 Attributes
Deprecated Attributes
Src: Specifies the address of the document to embed in the iFrame (Should start with "http://")
Width: Specifies the width in pixels
Height: Specifies the height in pixels
Name: Specifies the name
Sandbox: "1" = allow-forms, "2" = allow-same-origin, "3" = allow-scripts, "4" = allow-top-navigation. Enables a set of extra restrictions for the content
Seamless: "1" = Yes, "2" = No. Specifies that the iFrame should look like it is a part of the containing document
Srcdoc: Specifies the HTML content of the page to show in the iFrame
Scrolling: "1" = Yes, "2" = No, "3" = Auto. Specifies whether or not to display scrollbars (Not supported in HTML5)
Frameborder: "1" = Yes, "2" = No. Specifies whether or not to display a border around an iframe (Not supported in HTML5)
Id: Specifies a unique id for an element
Class: Specifies one or more classnames for the element (refers to a class in a style sheet)
Additional Class: Appends classnames to the (flexform) field "class"
Style: Specifies an inline style for the element
